summary: Completed frontend testing of minigame integration into Adventure Mode. Successfully verified that all minigame buttons have been removed from the main menu and are now accessible through the Salty Barnacle Tavern within the open world storyline.
passed_tests: Main menu displays only correct buttons: Enter World, Quick Fish, Settings, Rankings
No minigame buttons present on main menu (successfully removed)
Quick Fish mode (Stage Select) has no minigame buttons
Adventure Mode is accessible from main menu
Character creation system works for new players
Adventure Mode loads Harbor Square as starting location
Salty Barnacle Tavern is accessible from Harbor Square
Tavern contains 4 minigame hotspots: Memory (üß†), Timing (‚ö°), Quiz (‚ùì), Sorting (üìä)
Minigames can be opened by clicking tavern hotspots
Minigames can be closed with X button
Adventure Context properly manages minigame state
Minigame completion provides gold and XP rewards
